title: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: When entering an invalid date/time string in the report design, the system accepts it without displaying any error messages.
EB: The system should validate the date value upon input and display an error message when an invalid date/time string is entered.
SR:
1. Open the report design form.
2. Enter an invalid date/time string in the specified field.
3. Click on the save button.
4. Verify that an error message is displayed indicating the invalid date/time value.
